Awaken Solace is an Australian, female fronted symphonic metal band that combines a theatrical mix of orchestral power metal, medieval baroque and fantasy-style soundtracks. Full orchestral and choral arrangements compliment the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s five piece line-up of vocals, bass, guitar, drums and keyboards; a concept which makes the band unique to the Australian metal scene.
